QueryDefination.QueryString: SELECT q.quotationCode, qsg.quotationSubGroupCode, qsg.isCustomerPackage , ql.quotationLineSqlId QL_quotationLineSqlId, ql.quotationLineIncId QL_quotationLineIncId, ql.quotationLineOrder QuoLineOrder, t.testCode, ql.additionalColumn2, ql.additionalColumn4, ql.additionalColumn6 , qle.quotationLineSqlId QLE_quotationLineSqlId, qle.quotationLineIncId QLE_quotationLineIncId, qle.commercialItemCode , qsg.quotationSubGroupSqlId, qsg.quotationSubGroupIncId FROM Quotations q INNER JOIN QuotationsLines ql LEFT JOIN QuotationsSubGroupsQuotationsLines sgl INNER JOIN QuotationsSubGroups qsg ON qsg.quotationSubGroupIncId = sgl.quotationSubGroupIncId AND qsg.quotationSubGroupSqlId = sgl.quotationSubGroupSqlId AND qsg.isDeleted = 0x0 ON sgl.quotationLineSqlId = ql.quotationLineSqlId AND sgl.quotationLineIncId = ql.quotationLineIncId AND sgl.isDeleted = 0x0 LEFT JOIN Local_QuotationsLinesExtended qle ON qle.quotationLineIncId = ql.quotationLineIncId AND qle.quotationLineSqlId = ql.quotationLineSqlId LEFT JOIN Tests t ON ql.testSqlId = t.testSqlId AND ql.testIncId = t.testIncId ON ql.quotationSqlId = q.quotationSqlId AND ql.quotationIncId = q.quotationIncId AND ql.isDeleted = 0x0 WHERE q.quotationCode = @QuotationCode -- {QuotationCode}
